BackstoryDef.title: produced child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a baseliner human being mass-produced through artificial embryos. Although the humans produced by this technology are not much different from baseline humans, their immune systems have inevitable flaws. [PAWN_pronoun] spent his childhood receiving military training and education alongside thousands of his similar-looking brothers and sisters, preparing for the all-out war they would be involved in years later.
